column1: On Friday I had the privilege of joining VP @Mike_Pence for a policy roundtable in Butler County #PA engaging with business and #manufacturing industries in order to promote economic growth in the wake of the #COVID19 pandemic. https://t.co/rNjcT4E4HM #leadright #PA15 #VPOTUS https://t.co/CHsbwKLy3m

Did you know? The @realDonaldTrump administration has provided $301 million in federal #COVID19 testing assistance funding + other resources to #Pennsylvania to help scale&amp; meet testing goals. &gt; 10 Million tests have been performed nationwide. #COVID19response #PA

Did you know? The state of #PA + eligible local governmants received $4.9+ Billion from the #CARESAct’s #Coronavirus Relief Fund via the @realDonaldTrump administration to address unforeseen needs &amp; risks created by the #COVID19 public health emergency in #Pennsylvania.

Did you know? @HUDgov has made $288.8+ million in #COVID19 funding available to #Pennsylvania grantees via #CARESAct authorizations to help America’s low-income families & most vulnerable citizens via the @realDonaldTrump administration. #PA

Did you know? To supplement private sector supplies all of #Pennsylvania’s 683 #Medicaid & #Medicare-certified nursing homes are receiving a 14-day supply of personal protective equipment (#PPE) via the @realDonaldTrump administration. #PA #covid19response

Did you know? @HUDgov has made over $288.8 million in #COVID19 funding available to #Pennsylvania grantees via #CARESAct authorizations to help America’s low-income families and most vulnerable citizens via the @realDonaldTrump administration. #PA

Did you know? The Commonwealth of  #PA + eligible local govts. received over $4.9 Billion from the #CARESAct’s #Coronavirus Relief Fund via the @realDonaldTrump administration to help address unforeseen financial needs & risks created by the #COVID19 public health emergency.

Did you know? #Pennsylvania medical providers have received $2.3 Billion of Provider Relief Funds to support #healthcare-related expenses or lost revenue attributable to #COVID19 ensuring uninsured Americans can get tested and treated for novel #coronavirus. #PA #InItTogether
